name: Project Hornet
storyline: You are a field agent operative who works for an organization known as Mortfield Industries. Your mission is to search and contain any paranormal activity by any means necessary while operating under the adverse conditions of the post-nuclear European continent.
summary: With a procedurally-assisted open world full of dynamic events, secrets, and encounters with multiple factions and entities, the game will offer you an immersive simulation combined with the best experience of survival games.
